players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "I am the detective, I investigated Bob and he is innocent. Charlie is lying."
Charlie: "I am the detective. Alice is lying. I investigated her and she is mafioso. Vote Alice to win."

Bob: "Charlie and Alice are both lying to us. Charlie says he investigated Alice, but Alice said she was investigated by someone else last night and that person is Bob. However, I didn't investigate anyone. So either Charlie is lying about investigating Alice or Alice is lying about..."
You: "I am the detective. Charlie is lying. I investigated Bob, he is innocent. Vote Charlie to save the town."
